title:
The role of the intrinsic-$k_{\rm T}$ and soft gluon contributions in
  Drell-Yan production
abstract:
A review of the most recent results on determination of parton internal
transverse momentum in initial colliding hadron obtained within the Parton
Branching Method is presented and its interplay with non-perturbative soft
gluon contribution in Drell-Yan pairs production is discussed.
